articles.title: Zampa suspended for "audible obscenity" - Cricbuzz
articles.description: The legspinner will miss Melbourne Stars' next game against Hobart Hurricanes
articles.content: Adam Zampa has been suspended for one match in the ongoing Big Bash Lague after "accepting a charge for an audible obscenity", announced Cricket Australia in a statement on Thursday, December 31.
